title: At least I know I can intentionally feed without punishment
body: Actions speak louder than words in most games, but not here in league of legends. Rather, they focus on toxicity too much, and not what causes it. So as long as I'm kind to people in chat, I can potentially ruin a lot of people's games and just say "sorry guys, I'm trying my best :(" and get off scot free. That's intensely stupid riot. At least I know I can run it down mid and make sure every one in the game gets reported after calling me a %%%% several times, because that's offensive, and offensive language has no place in a game!!! Whereas cheating, scripting, feeding, griefing. All of those are perfectly fine. ESPECIALLY if you're lower elo, because it's so dynamic down there xd. I doubt this game will last longer than 2-3 more years at this rate.
